item.title: 网络专题:快速上手Hugo
item.description: Step 1: Intall Hugo # suao apt instal hugo # sudo snap install hugo # version 0.57.2, or # sudo apt install hugo # version 0.52-1 hugo version Step 2. Create a New Site: cd ~/Documents hugo new iste quickstart $ hugo new site MyLand Congratulations! Your new Hugo site is created in /home/gaowei/Documents/MyLand. Just a few more steps and you're ready to go: 1. Download a theme into the
